articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: The BBC hears from the parents of four young women who were taken by Hamas on 7 October 2023 and held for 15 months.
articles.title: Israel-Gaza war: Parents of freed Hamas hostages give details of ordeal

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: The BBC has established the Chancellor left the financial institution nine months earlier than she states in her LinkedIn profile.
articles.title: Rachel Reeves's CV exaggerated time at Bank of England

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Many world leaders, including Ukraine's President Zelensky, are finding the world is more uncertain under new US leadership.
articles.title: Zelensky forced to face tough new reality after Trump-Putin phone call

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Ukraine's president says he will not be shut out of peace negotiations after Trump says he agreed to start talks with Putin.
articles.title: Volodymyr Zelensky says no peace deal without Ukraine involvement

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: An inquest into the death of Semina Halliwell, who said she was raped by an older boy, finds her death was "unpreventable".
articles.title: Semina Halliwell: The funny, kind, 12-year-old who took a fatal overdose

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Nurse manager Esther Davidson said she was advised that Dr Beth Upton was entitled to use the women's changing rooms.
articles.title: Trans doctor had the 'right' to use women's room

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: BBC News has learnt that there was an expenses investigation into Rachel Reeves, and two other senior managers, when she worked at HBOS.
articles.title: The Chancellor and her expenses before she became an MP

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: They were convicted of a plot threatening to leak hundreds of personal photos, videos and medical records.
articles.title: Michael Schumacher blackmail trial: Three guilty of targeting family

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: The driver, who was detained at the scene, was a 24-year-old Afghan asylum seeker, police said.
articles.title: Dozens injured in suspected car ramming attack in Munich

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: After a frenetic 24 hours of US declarations, there is a tangible sense that Europe's leaders have been surprised.
articles.title: Europe caught out by Trump's Russia move
